title: The Importance of High-Quality, Original, Focused Content
description: One of the best investments a law firm can make is in high-quality, original, focused content for their website. Content not only drives SEO, but it is also crucial for attracting and retaining readers, and for converting those readers into clients. Justia CEO Tim Stanley offers insights into writing high-quality content, and he discusses the importance of having that content also be both original (non-duplicative) and focused.
